resources.string: This program provides various cycling routes in Lithuania. Convenient to use because you can choose a route based on location on the map. You can see points of interest, distance, complexity and road type. You can also have the route displayed on Google maps. Some maps also have navigation instructions. If you have and want to share an interesting route, contact youstinus@pm.me (youstinus@protonmail.com). Requires Google maps (My maps link) with one or more lines (Add line or shape). You can also share a KML file with coordinates (LineString) and points of interest (Placemark). You can plan your routes with tools that allow you to get kml, kmz or gpx files. For example: Google.com_mymaps or Maps.ie_map-my-route
